title: 008: Wartortle
author: Chris Taylor
description:
In this episode of Magmar Sucks we discover Wartortle’s secret life as a defender of underdogs everywhere and a crowd favorite at the old folks home.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), David, [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Wartortle)
